name: Derlon Shampoo 2 in 1
ingredients: ingredients: aqua, sodium laureth sulfate, sodium chloride, cocamidopropyl betaine, aloe barbadensis leaf juice, citrullus lanatus fruit extract, glycerin, peg-3 distearate, guar hydroxypropyltrimonium chloride, parfum, benzyl salicylate, hexyl cinnamal, linalool, limonene, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, benzoic acid, citric acid, sodium hydroxide.
composition: Ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Sodium Chloride, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Citrullus Lanatus Fruit Extract, Glycerin, PEG-3 Distearate, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Parfum, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Limonene, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Benzoic Acid, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide.
